welcome_message_body: Welcome to Daitocho, Japan! Enjoy the city's serene atmosphere, beautiful cherry blossoms, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Daitocho has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Itami Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Kansai International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Users must register and log in to access the network.
